page.title: 18CHILDREN'S POEMS I'D LIKE
page.content:
I'd like to be a pianist, A pianist,that's me! Strumming up the keyboard, Playing every key. But when it comes to practising, My motivation fails. Cos Mum keeps on shouting, "Please play those scales!" I like to play good tunes the best, I'm sure I'll make it yet. But to be a famous pianist, I'll have to do the rest.
I'd like to be a model because of the clothes they wear. I'd like to be a hostess for making the coffee there. I'd like to be a dressmaker to make things bright and clean. I'd like to be a swimmer to swim a little race. But I'd still like to be ,My plain,plain self.
